document.full_text: academic research has shown that monetary inducements work in luring more people to the polls. maybe that's what is needed to enliven turnout in tuesday's city and county elections.
document.title: chicago news cooperative: want to increase voting? discounts seem to work
lines_and_colors: academic research has shown that monetary inducements work in luring more people to the polls. maybe that's what is needed to enliven turnout in tuesday's city and county elections.
